patternSteps.1: Ready Posture: Parallel Stance with an Overlapped Back Hand
patternSteps.2: Step 1. Move the right foot to C to form a left walking stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with a twin fist. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.3: Step 2. Move the left foot to C to form a right walking stance toward D while executing a horizontal strike with a twin knife-hand. Perform in slow motion.
patternSteps.4: Step 3. Move the left foot to D, forming a right rear foot stance toward D while executing a middle inward block to D with the left outer forearm.
patternSteps.5: Step 4. Execute a low inward block to D with the right palm while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the right foot, and bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder.
patternSteps.6: Step 5. Move the right foot to D, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a middle punch to D with the right fist.
patternSteps.7: Step 6. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a left L-stance toward D. Perform 5 and 6 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.8: Step 7. Move the left foot to Din a stamping motion to form a right L-stance toward D while executing a high outward strike to D with the left back hand.
patternSteps.9: Step 8. Execute an inward vertical kick to the left palm with the right reverse footsword.
patternSteps.10: Step 9. Lower the right foot to D in a stamping motion, forming a left L-stance toward D while executing a high outward strike to D with the right back hand.
patternSteps.11: Step 10. Execute an inward vertical kick to the right palm with the left reverse footsword.
patternSteps.12: Step 11. Lower the left foot to D, and then execute a horizontal block with a twin palm while forming a right L-stance toward D, slipping the left foot. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.13: Step 12. Move the right foot to D, forming a right walking stance toward D while executing a high side block to D with the right reverse knife-hand. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.14: Step 13. Execute a middle side block to D with the left reverse knife-hand while maintaininga right walking stance toward D. Perform in a slow motion.
patternSteps.15: Step 14. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.16: Step 15. Execute a middle punch to D with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.17: Step 16. Execute a downward kick to AC with the right foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 15.
patternSteps.18: Step 17. Lower the right foot to C in a stamping motion, forming a left L-stance toward C while executing a downward strike to C with the right back fist.
patternSteps.19: Step 18. Execute an outward vertical kick to BC with the left foot, keeping the position of the hands as they were in 17.
patternSteps.20: Step 19. Lower the left foot to C in a stamping motion to form a right L-stance toward C while executing a downward strike to C with the left back fist.
patternSteps.21: Step 20. Execute a high punch to D with the left fist while forming a right walking stance toward D, pivoting with the left foot.
patternSteps.22: Step 21. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward D. Perform 20 and 21 in a fast motion.
patternSteps.23: Step 22. Move the left foot to D, forming a right rear foot stance toward D while executing an upward block with the left bow wrist.
patternSteps.24: Step 23. Move the right foot to D to form a left rear foot stance toward D while executing an upward block with the right bow wrist.
patternSteps.25: Step 24. Move the left foot to C, forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a pressing block with the left palm.
patternSteps.26: Step 25. Move the right foot to C to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a pressing block with the right palm. Perform 24 and 25 in a slow motion.
patternSteps.27: Step 26. Bring the left foot to the right foot to form a closed stance toward C while bringing both back hands in front of the lower abdomen in a circular motion, hitting the left palm with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.28: Step 27. Move the left foot to D, forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a rising block with the left knife-hand.
patternSteps.29: Step 28. Execute a high punch to D with the right fist while maintaining a left walking stance toward D.
patternSteps.30: Step 29. Slide to D to form a left L-stance toward D while executing an upset punch to D with the left fist, bringing the right side fist in front of the left shoulder.
patternSteps.31: Step 30. Move the right foot to C, forming a left walking stance toward D while executing a high thrust with the right angle fingertip.
patternSteps.32: Step 31. Move the left foot on line CD to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a rising block with the right knife-hand.
patternSteps.33: Step 32. Execute a high punch to C with the left fist while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.34: Step 33. Slide to C to form a right L-stance toward C while executing an upset punch to C with the right fist, bringing the left side fist in front of the right shoulder.
patternSteps.35: Step 34. Move the left foot to D, forming a right walking stance toward C while executing a high thrust with the left angle fingertip.
patternSteps.36: Step 35. Execute a low guarding block to C with a reverse knife-hand in a circular motion while forming a left L-stance toward C, pivoting with the left foot.
patternSteps.37: Step 36. Execute a low guarding block to D with a reverse knife-hand in a circular motion while forming a right L-stance toward D, pivoting with the right foot.
patternSteps.38: Step 37. Execute a low block to D with the right forearm and a middle outward block to D with the left knife-hand while forming a left walking stance toward D, slipping the left foot.
patternSteps.39: Step 38. Move the right foot to D in a stamping motion to form a right walking stance toward D at the same time executing a high vertical punch to D with a twin fist.
patternSteps.40: Step 39. Pull the right reverse footsword to the left knee joint, forming a left one-leg stance toward D while striking the left palm with the right back forearm.
patternSteps.41: Step 40. Execute a middle back piercing kick to C with the right foot, pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
patternSteps.42: Step 41. Lower the right foot to C to form a sitting stance toward A while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.43: Step 42. Slide to C maintaining a sitting stance toward A while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.44: Step 43. Move the right foot to D in a stamping motion, turning counter clockwise to form a sitting stance toward B while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.45: Step 44. Slide to C, maintaining a sitting stance toward B while executing a W-shape block with the outer forearm.
patternSteps.46: Step 45. Pull the left reverse footsword to the right knee joint, forming a right one-leg stance toward C while striking the right palm with the left back forearm.
patternSteps.47: Step 46. Execute a high back piercing kick to D with the left foot, pulling both hands in the opposite direction.
patternSteps.48: Step 47. Lower the left foot to C in a jumping motion, forming a left X-stance toward C while executing a pressing block with an X-fist.
patternSteps.49: Step 48. Move the right foot to D, forming a left walking stance toward C while executing a front strike with the left under fist.
patternSteps.50: Step 49. Move the right foot to C to form a right walking stance toward C while executing a front strike with the right under fist.
patternSteps.51: Step 50. Execute a middle pushing block to C with the left palm while maintaining a right walking stance toward C.
patternSteps.52: Step 51. Execute a circular block to A with the right knife-hand while forming a left walking stance toward AD.
patternSteps.53: Step 52. Move the left foot to C to form a left walking stance toward C while executing a middle pushing block to C with the right palm.
patternSteps.54: Step 53. Execute a circular block to B with the left knife-hand while forming a right walking stance toward BD.
patternSteps.55: Step 54. Execute a high side piercing kick to D with the right foot, forming a forearm guarding block, and then lower it to the left foot to form a closed stance toward D while executing a twin side back elbow thrust.
patternSteps.56: Step 55. Move the left foot to D, forming a sitting stance toward A while executing a middle side punch to D with the left fist.
patternSteps.57: Step 56. Execute a middle punch to D with the right fist while forming a left walking stance toward D, pivoting with the left foot.
patternSteps.58: End: Bring the foot back to a ready position
